snippet.title: EARL GREY {Game Trailer}
snippet.description:
EARL GREY | A Pixel Art, Perma-death, Survival Game mainly created in Gray-scale coloring.

Forage Items to Survive
Hunt for Food
Explore the World
Upgrade your Rifle
Watch out for Hostile Animals
Fight the Angry Bosses
Save your Forest
Can you Survive?
Can you Win?
You Have One Life to Try!

Can you fight and kill the angry bosses taking control of your beloved homeland?  Rid the land of these bosses while hunting and foraging to survive.  Find fuel for your generator to give power to you cabin where you can create Hardware out of foraged items.  Use Hardware to upgrade your Rifle and remove rubble piles for further exploration.  Help Earl Survive in this fun and simplistic Pixel Art World, but remember, do not die as you only have one life to live.

EARL GREY
Presented by....................JustWall Games
Concept by.......................Mark Mauer
Art by................................Mark Mauer
Sound & Music by............Mark Mauer
Programming by..............Mark Mauer

Additional Concepts by:
Mason Mauer
Kaelie Mauer
Hunter Boxell

EARL GREY (itch.io Page)
https://justwall.itch.io/earlgrey

Earl Grey Soundtrack:
https://soundcloud.com/justwall/sets/earl-grey-soundtrack
